text: Tumacya striyampaiki jya vyabhicara karatila tara tyancyabaddala apalyapaiki cara saksidara bolavuna ghya jara tyanni saksa dili tara tya striyanna gharata bandista karuna theva, yethaparyanta ki mrtyune tyance ayusya sampavave, kinva sarvasrestha allahane tyancyasathi ekhada dusara marga kadhava
